title: McAfee Total Protection 3-Device 2025 |Security Software Includes Antivirus, Secure VPN, Password Manager, Identity Monitoring | Download
description: McAfee Total Protection for 3 devices provides standard protection for your personal info and privacy, so you can enjoy life online. It includes antivirus, Text Scam Detector, identity monitoring, Secure VPN, and more. Experience award-winning antivirus protection, continuously updated to safeguard your devices against the latest threats. Our AI-powered real-time PC protection prevents and removes viruses, malware, ransomware, and other online threats. Our AI-powered Text Scam Detector automatically detects and blocks risky links in text messages, emails, and social media posts – even if you accidentally click on them. Protect your online privacy with our no-log Secure VPN. It turns on automatically for unsafe Wi-Fi networks, safeguarding your personal info, passwords, credit card numbers, and more. Get alerted up to 10 months sooner than similar services if your personal information is found in a data breach. McAfee Identity Monitoring gives you the advantage of earlier detection and quick response to potential identity theft. Browse the web confidently with our color-coded safety ratings for search results and social media links. We’ll also block dangerous downloads that may contain viruses or malware. Easily create, store, and manage strong, unique passwords for all your online accounts. Our password manager also auto-fills your login info, making it simple and secure to access your accounts.
